metadata.title: CVE-2020-36781 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:i2c: imx: fix reference leak when pm_runtime_get_sync failsIn i2c_imx_xfer() and i2c_imx_remove(), the pm reference countis not expected to be incremented on return.However, pm_runtime_get_sync will increment pm reference counteven failed. Forgetting to putting operation will result in areference leak here.Replace it with pm_runtime_resume_and_get to keep usagecounter balanced.
